snippet.title: Super Mario Advance (Wii U Virtual Console) Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Super Mario Advance is now available on the Wii U Virtual Console service in Europe!

A popular launch title for the Game Boy Advance, Super Mario Advance features two classic Mario games in one. Super Mario Bros. 2 returns with an enhanced version unique to GBA, with new features not present in the original, and improved graphics and sound. Play as Mario, Luigi, Toad or Peach, and escape the mysterious land of Subcon.

Check out our website: http://www.nintendo-insider.com
Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/nintendoins
Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/nintendoinsider
